keys: se déplacer tiennent le premier rôle

          <title>
            <string language="en">Light waves of a moving and stationary star</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtwellen eines beweglichen und stationären 
Sternes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les vagues de lumière d'un mobile et 
stationnaire tiennent le premier rôle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas da luz de uma estrela movente e 
estacionária</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde della luce di una stella commovente e 
stazionaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτεινά κύματα μιας κίνησης και ενός στάσιμου 
αστεριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas de la luz de una estrella móvil e 
inmóvil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The illustration shows light waves that reaches an observer's eye from a star that is stationary and in motion.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moving star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">observer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stationary star</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt helle Wellen, die das Auge 
eines Beobachters von einem Stern erreicht, der und in der Bewegung 
stationär ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'illustration montre les vagues légères qui 
atteint l'oeil d'un observateur d'un tenir le premier rôle qui est stationnaire 
et dans le mouvement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ilustração mostra ondas claras que alcança o
olho de um observador de uma estrela que seja estacionária e no 
movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra le onde chiare che 
raggiunge l'occhio dell'osservatore da una stella che è stazionaria e
nel movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει φωτεινά κύματα που φθάνει στο 
μάτι ενός παρατηρητή από ένα αστέρι που είναι στάσιμο και στην
κίνηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ilustración muestra ondas ligeras que alcanza
el ojo de un observador de una estrella que sea inmóvil y en el 
movimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beweglicher Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stationärer Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">se déplacer tiennent le premier rôle</string>

          <keyword>
